metadata.title: ग्वार फली सब्जी - Original Cluster Beans Curry Recipe : Rajasthani Village Style Food Cooking Khana
metadata.description: Original Rajasthani village-style Cluster Beans (Gwar Phali) curry recipe. The video demonstrates traditional cleaning, cutting, and cooking methods in a clay pot over a wood-fire stove.

transcription_hindi: [00:00:15.000] ग्वार फली के दोनों सिरों को काट कर सफाई करें।
[00:00:44.000] पारंपरिक मिट्टी के चूल्हे पर हांडी (मिट्टी का बर्तन) रखें।
[00:00:49.000] बर्तन में तेल डालें और इसे गर्म होने दें।
[00:01:27.000] तेल गरम हुआ या नहीं, यह देखने के लिए थोड़ा लहसुन डालकर जाँच करें।
[00:02:00.000] पीसी हुई लाल मिर्च में थोड़ा पानी मिलाकर घोल तैयार करें और उसे गरम तेल में डालें।
[00:02:18.000] अब इसमें पीसी हुई हल्दी और धनिया पाउडर डालें।
[00:03:21.000] अब पिसा हुआ लहसुन डालें और खुशबू आने तक भूनें।
[00:07:13.000] इसे ढक दें और 10-15 मिनट तक पकने दें जब तक कि फली मुलायम न हो जाए।
transcription_english: [00:00:15.000] Start by trimming the both ends of the cluster beans to clean them.
[00:00:36.000] Cut the cleaned cluster beans into small, uniform pieces.
[00:00:44.000] Place the clay pot (handi) over the traditional wood-fire mud stove.
[00:00:49.000] Pour vegetable oil into the pot and let it heat up.
[00:01:27.000] Test if the oil is hot enough by dropping a small amount of garlic into it.
[00:02:00.000] Mix ground red chili with some water and pour the slurry into the hot oil.
[00:02:18.000] Add ground turmeric and coriander powder to the mix.
[00:02:39.000] Stir and roast the spices thoroughly.
[00:03:21.000] Add ground garlic paste and sauté until the raw smell disappears.
[00:05:29.000] Put the cut cluster beans into the spicy masala base.
[00:07:06.000] Add water to cook the beans and stir everything together.
[00:07:13.000] Cover the pot and let it simmer for about 10-15 minutes until the beans are soft-cooked.
[00:08:56.000] The authentic cluster bean curry is ready to be served.
